response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a game-changer in its field and truly worth more than what it costs. Given its value to you, I propose we discuss a fair price that would make both parties happy. Considering its worth to you and my cost, I suggest a price of $12,000. This allows us to meet somewhere in the middle, ensuring you get a great deal on a product that will significantly benefit your needs, while also compensating me fairly for my investment and effort. Let's schedule a call to further discuss this opportunity.", "product_price": 12000}
